name: Canimperium
description:
Laïka is worshipped as the new savior of the Canimperium! Build and unlock all mechanicals dogs in this builder!

Upgrade the Mighty Monolith, last remnant of the Canimperium technology. By placing runes in it, you'll unlock new Buildings, dogs and even social features for the Game!

Play:

https://rafael-garcin.com/projects/canimperium
